name: @euriklis/validator-ts
description: A javascript package for testing and managing of type coonditions.

scripts.test: rm -rdf dist && tsc && tsc-alias && ts-node ./dist/bin/validator-cli.js && rm -rdf dist/Tests

bin.validator: rm -rdf dist/Tests && tsc && tsc-alias && dist/bin/validator-cli.js && rm -rdf dist/Tests

author: Euriklis <euriklis@hotmail.com>
